channel.title: Guide on Gavyn | May I Love U
channel.description: Recent content in Guide on Gavyn | May I Love U

item.title: May I Love U
item.description: Notice me, focus on me, look at me. I always talk to myself about the following question: How should I proceed to become a successful man like my father or my grandfather? But I have never arrived at a final answer. I can’t even emulate them when they were as young as I am now. Therefore, I promise myself that I will do my utmost to become a better man than they were.
